dcterms:creator: Alexis Conneau
Guillaume Lample
Ruty Rinott
Holger Schwenk
Ves Stoyanov
Adina Williams
Samuel R. Bowman
dcterms:description: XNLI is a benchmark for evaluating cross-lingual sentence understanding, consisting of 7500 human-annotated development and test examples in NLI three-way classification format across 15 languages.
dcterms:title: XNLI
dcterms:language: Multiple languages including English, French, Spanish, German, Greek, Bulgarian, Russian, Turkish, Arabic, Vietnamese, Thai, Chinese, Hindi, Swahili, and Urdu

dcterms:creator: Samuel R. Bowman
Gabor Angeli
Christopher Potts
Christopher D. Manning
dcterms:description: MultiNLI is a large annotated corpus for learning natural language inference, consisting of nearly a million examples.
dcterms:title: Multi-Genre Natural Language Inference Corpus (MultiNLI)

dcterms:creator: Michal Ziemski
Marcin Junczys-Dowmunt
Bruno Pouliquen
dcterms:description: The United Nations Parallel Corpus is a multilingual parallel corpus that provides translations of UN documents.
dcterms:title: United Nations Parallel Corpus

dcterms:creator: Philipp Koehn
dcterms:description: Europarl is a parallel corpus for statistical machine translation, derived from the proceedings of the European Parliament.
dcterms:title: Europarl Corpus

dcterms:creator: Jörg Tiedemann
dcterms:description: OpenSubtitles 2018 is a parallel corpus extracted from movie and TV subtitles, providing a large amount of multilingual data.
dcterms:title: OpenSubtitles 2018 Corpus

dcterms:creator: Kunchukuttan Anoop
Mehta Pratik
Bhattacharyya Pushpak
dcterms:description: The IIT Bombay English-Hindi Parallel Corpus is a bilingual parallel corpus for English and Hindi.
dcterms:title: IIT Bombay English-Hindi Parallel Corpus

dcterms:creator: Jörg Tiedemann
dcterms:description: Bible and Quran Transcriptions provide parallel data for religious texts in multiple languages.
dcterms:title: Bible and Quran Transcriptions

dcterms:creator: Jörg Tiedemann
dcterms:description: Global Voices Corpus is a multilingual parallel corpus that provides translations of news articles and stories.
dcterms:title: Global Voices Corpus
